title: Crazy Wizard Ivern - Skin Concept
body:
Hi guys. Here is a skin idea for the new champ Ivern! Complete with some ability effects and Daisy!
Hope you guys like it :)

[](http://orig13.deviantart.net/d46c/f/2016/269/c/f/crazy_wizard_ivern_skin_concept_by_ramisirote-daiy2ws.png)

replies.body: Wow I'm impressed. The champion isn't even out yet and there are already skin concepts. Neat idea overall though.
I really wanted to make a skin for him, since whenever there is a new champ I love to see how people re-imagine them, and see what potential they have for skins in the future.
Just what I thought. The author must've just looked at the champ and immediately see this or something :D
that reminds me of vermin supreme

Necromancer Ivern that siphons souls from jungle camps?
Bush can look yellow-grayish and dead, and ultimate could be similar to something depicted above.
I wanted the skin to be mostly light-hearted to match Ivern's theme and movement

At the speed of light, Ivern skin concepts.

This is a pretty cool skin with the whole wizard theme to it, and I think if the skin was purple/blue (Ryze colour) I would like it more, but that's just my opinion.
I thought of giving him blueish skin, but decided the pale skin worked better with the classic "crazy wizard with a star and moon cap" I was trying to go for
this looks more like it should be called dungeons and dragons Ivern

Wow this is a really good skin idea. Thank you!
Amazing art. "Daisy" seems a little too angry being around Ivern but I guess a skin can also change personalities.
